A new chicken has arrived to town!

New branch oppening at Puerta de Alcala, Madrid!

Your favorite ABQ fried chicken now at Madrid. Get ready for our big oppening, suscribe and we’ll let you know our exclusive oppening day!

Did you know?

We only cook Free-range chickens for all our dishes. That’s why you will always want to order more.

All done!

You will know about us soon!
